title: Static Analysis

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to connect to and disconnect from Wi-Fi access points and to make changes to configured Wi-Fi networks.

certificate_findings: Application is signed with a code signing certificate

Application is signed with v1 signature scheme, making it vulnerable to Janus vulnerability on Android 5.0-8.0, if signed only with v1 signature scheme. Applications running on Android 5.0-7.0 signed with v1, and v2/v3 scheme is also vulnerable.

file_analysis.finding: Certificate/Key files hardcoded inside the app.

metadata.cwe: CWE-312: Cleartext Storage of Sensitive Information
metadata.description: Files may contain hardcoded sensitive information like usernames, passwords, keys etc.

FCS_STO_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not store any credentials to non-volatile memory.

FCS_CKM_EXT.1.1.choice: The application generate no asymmetric cryptographic keys.

FDP_DEC_EXT.1.1.choice: The application has access to no hardware resources.

FDP_DEC_EXT.1.2.choice: The application has access to no sensitive information repositories.

FDP_NET_EXT.1.1.choice: The application has no network communications.

FDP_DAR_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not encrypt files in non-volatile memory.

FTP_DIT_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not encrypt any data in traffic or does not transmit any data between itself and another trusted IT product.

FIA_X509_EXT.2.1.choice: The application use X.509v3 certificates as defined by RFC 5280 to support authentication for HTTPS , TLS.

strings: "email_ends_with_whitespace" : "Am Ende der E-Mail Adresse sind Leerzeichen. Bitte entferne diese und versuche es erneut."
"ABOUT_CONTENT" : "Diese Anwendung konfiguriert das Selfnet WLAN für dein Smartphone."

"PRIVACY_AGREEMENT" : "This Privacy Policy clarifies the users of the "Selfnet Wifi-Config" app offered by "Selfnet e.V. Allmandring 8a 70569 in Stuttgart", hereinafter referred to as App, about the use of personal data in the App. Through the app, the email address and password for the services of the provider are collected and translated into a WiFi profile to access the provider's WiFi infrastructure on the user's smartphone. Apart from that, the data will not be transferred or stored by the app in any way."
"screen_lock_hint" : "Note: If you did not setup a screen lock, Android will refuse to store the security settings!"

"PRIVACY_AGREEMENT" : "Diese Datenschutzerklärung klärt die Nutzer der App "Selfnet Wifi-Config", angeboten von "Selfnet e.V. Allmandring 8a 70569 in Stuttgart", im Folgenden App genannt, über die Verwendung von personenbezogenen Daten in der App auf. Durch die App werden die E-Mail-Adresse und das Passwort für die Dienste des Anbieters erhoben und in der Form eines WLAN-Profils zum Zugriff auf die WLAN-Infrastruktur des Anbieters auf dem Smartphone des Nutzers übersetzt. Abgesehen davon werden die Daten durch die App in keinster Weise übertragen oder gespeichert."

"HELP_TEXT" : "If you face any issues connecting to the wireless LAN please check whether you typed in your password and email address correctly.
If this doesn't help contact support@selfnet.de."
"screen_lock_hint" : "Hinweis: Wenn du keinen Sperrbildschirm eingerichtet hast, kann Android die Einstellungen nicht speichern."
"ABOUT_CONTENT" : "This application configures the Selfnet Wi-Fi for your smartphone."
"email_ends_with_whitespace" : "Email address ends with whitespaces - please remove them."

"success_explain_text" : "Ein neuer WLAN-Eintrag mit den richtigen Sicherheitseinstellungen wurde angelegt.

Wenn du Probleme beim Verbinden mit dem WLAN hast, prüfe bitte, ob du deine Anmeldedaten richtig eingegeben hast. Diese Nachricht bestätigt nur, dass das WLAN-Profil angelegt wurde, nicht dass deine Nutzerdaten richtig sind."

"HELP_TEXT" : "Wenn du Probleme beim Verbinden mit dem WLAN hast, überprüfe bitte ob du deine E-Mail Adresse und das Passwort richtig eingegeben hast. Wenn die Verbindung dann immernoch nicht klappt, schreib uns einfach an support@selfnet.de."

"success_explain_text" : "A Wi-Fi connection entry with the correct security settings was created.

If you face problems connecting to the Selfnet Wi-Fi please check whether you've provided the correct credentials. This message only confirms the profile's creation but doesn't validate you username and password."
"no_credentials_provided" : "Please provide your Wi-Fi credentials from MySelfnet."

high.title: Application vulnerable to Janus Vulnerability
high.description: Application is signed with v1 signature scheme, making it vulnerable to Janus vulnerability on Android 5.0-8.0, if signed only with v1 signature scheme. Applications running on Android 5.0-7.0 signed with v1, and v2/v3 scheme is also vulnerable.
